sen.j: 大和野菜（やまとやさい）とは、現在の奈良県（旧大和国）で生産されている野菜のうち、奈良県が「大和野菜」と認定したもので、在来種である「大和の伝統野菜」17品目と栽培等に工夫を加えた「大和のこだわり野菜」4品目からなる。
sen.e: "Yamato-yasai" collectively means the vegetables consisting of 17 items of local varieties called "Yamato no dento yasai" (traditional vegetables of Yamato) and four items called "Yamato no Kodawari yasai " grown with particular devices, recognized by the Nara Prefectural government, among vegetables which are produced in current Nara Prefecture (old Yamato Province).

"Yamato-yasai" collectively refers to locally produced vegetables that have been recognized by the Nara Prefectural governament (old Yamato Province), consisting of 17 types of local produce called "Yamato no dento yasai" (traditional vegetables of Yamato) and four types called "Yamato no Kodawari yasai" (particular vegetables of Yamato) which are grown with particular technique.

"Yamato-yasai" collectively refers to locally produced vegetables that have been recognized by the Nara Prefectural governament (old Yamato Province), consisting of 17 types of local produce called 'Yamato no dento yasai' (traditional vegetables of Yamato) and four types called 'Yamato no Kodawari yasai' (particular vegetables of Yamato) which are grown with particular technique.

tit.e: Items recognized as "Yamato no dento yasai" (traditional vegetables of Yamato)
